Articles.Content:
Well I have tried 1.0, nice, well sort of, fortunate for me that I backed up my old .90

Will there be a Mod compatibility List here soon?

"Niles"

It's been literally ***hours*** since the release of 1.0

You might want to give it some time...

> 
> It's been literally ***hours*** since the release of 1.0
> You might want to give it some time...

What, with the confirmation that the Illuminati have basically been funding the game since Alpha, there's so many resources there that the mod developers can use that there's not an excuse for them to have their mods released as 2.0 on the 1.0 release.

I mean, that's totally not an unrealistic expectation, right?

LOL! I was just asking, I know its been hours, but it dont hurt to ask right? {Ouch}

"Niles"
